selected_quotes: Male Care of Infants Shortens Lactation! So cool! cc
What is the use of males? Comparative analysis of male care in mammals, new
Mammal species in which males carry offspring (Fig. 1) have shorter lactation periods
My first paper; the evolution of male care in mammals is now published in @NatureComms
Male care in mammals relation w life history

citation.abstract: Male care has energetic and opportunity costs, and is more likely to evolve when males gain greater certainty of paternity or when future mating opportunities are scarce. However, little is known about the substantial benefits that males may provide to females and offspring. Using phylogenetic comparative methods and a sample of over 500 mammalian species, we show that mammals in which males carry the offspring have shorter lactation periods, which leads to more frequent breeding events. Provisioning the female is associated with larger litters and shorter lactation. Offspring of species with male care have similar weaning mass to those without despite being supported by a shorter lactation period, implying that they grow faster. We propose that males provide an energetic contribution during the most expensive time of female reproduction, lactation, and that different male care behaviours increase female fecundity, which in turn helps males offset the costs of caring.
citation.title: Male care and life history traits in mammals

news.title: Zoology: Fatherly care goes hand in hand with mothers' reproductive success(Nature Communications)
news.summary: In mammals, female reproductive rate (fecundity) is increased when males provide food or contribute to rearing offspring, finds a study published in Nature Communications this week.

news.title: 【動物学】父親の養育行動は母親の多産性と密接な関係がある(Nature Communications)
news.summary: 哺乳類の場合、雄が食料を提供し、あるいは仔の養育に貢献すれば、雌の繁殖率（繁殖能力）が上昇するという研究結果を報告する論文が、今週掲載される。雄による養育は、雌の授乳期の短縮、同腹仔の増加、繁殖期の頻度上昇と関連していることが分かったのだ。 哺乳類のいずれの種でも、雌は大量の資源を仔の養育に投資する。ところが、雄が雌（母親）に食料を提供することで養育に直接的または間接的に貢献しているのは、哺乳類全種の約10％にすぎない。雄にとって、仔を養育することは新たな交尾の機会を諦めるということであり、その雄…
